detail_desc: Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a tie belt and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Rectangular sunglasses with plastic frames, metal and plastic sidepieces and adjustable nose pads. Tinted, UV-protective, plastic, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set in soft cotton jersey. Dress with a print motif on the front, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Elasticated hairband with a sewn-on bow.

Washed cotton twill joggers in a relaxed style with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, welt back pockets, and slightly lower crotch. Tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and elasticated hems. Regular fit.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.

Oversized shirt jacket in a felted weave with a collar, concealed fastening down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Large, open chest pockets, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with concealed fasteners at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with a V-neck with pleating and covered buttons at the top. Long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gathered seam at the waist and hem with a wide flounce. Lined.
Boxy polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing at cuffs.
Cotton chambray trainers with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Padded tongue and heels. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Large plastic earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 8.5 cm.
Belt in imitation suede with a button stud fastening. Large, engraved metal buckle decorated with plastic beads and a faceted glass stone.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.

Wide blouse in a cotton weave with inset lace trims and a round neckline. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, a yoke with pin-tucks front and back, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved lace dress with a round neckline, zip at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges. V-shaped waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Classic T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Straight cut with short sleeves.
Short, high-waisted skirt in grained imitation leather with pleats at the top, a zip at the back and side pockets. Unlined.
Glittery metal hairclips. Length 5 cm.

Handbag accessory with a metal keyring and carabiner hook, and an imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, imitation leather tassel and a small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 4x11.5x15 cm.
Flared blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and gathered yoke. Buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Shorts in stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft wool blend with a hood, buttons down the front and trimmed edges. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless top in satin with lace details and a deep V-neck front and back.
Ankle-length suit trousers in an airy linen and cotton blend with a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

prod_name: D2 PE - DELHI MID SIZE BAG
detail_desc: Stylish shoulder bag in leather with a soft, smooth finish and a metal trim at the top. Wide leather shoulder strap, a metal chain handle made of rectangular links, and a flap with a concealed magnetic fastener. One large and one smaller inner compartment and a card compartment. Lining in twill with a slight sheen. Size approx. 4.5x15.5x28 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a broderie anglaise flounce over the shoulder seams.
Knitted top with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in a woven silk blend with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top and yoke with a pleat at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and sewn-in ties at the front of the waist. Overlapping side seams and slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Unlined.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Semi-transparent ribbed section at the top of the back and down the sides.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.

Short-sleeved jersey playsuit with a deep V-neck and wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front, and deep V-neck at the back with horizontal straps at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a tie belt at the waist.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a belt at the waist and a rounded hem.

Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Comes with a shoulder bag in soft cotton jersey with appliqués on the front, a hook and loop fastening at the top and a glittery shoulder strap.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Light support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Boxer shorts in printed cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Thong body in lace with crossover straps at the front and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Low cut at the back, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, a lined gusset with press-studs, and a string back.

Double-breasted coat in a sturdy weave made from a wool blend with wide notch lapels, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Wide belt at the waist with a press-stud fastening, and a single back vent. Lined.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top, short cap sleeves and elastication at the back of the waist.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in airy cotton with a grandad collar, button placket, flap chest pocket with a button and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Trousers in lightweight cotton denim with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake side pockets and fake leg pockets with a decorative flap. Fake fly and legs that can be rolled up and secured with a tab and button.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Short dress in ribbed jersey with an embroidered collar in a cotton weave. Small opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and gathered seams at the waist and lower down the skirt. Unlined.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a rib-knit fold-up hem.
Jumper in a soft, boxy knit with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Full-length leggings in sturdy jersey made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with concealed elastication, sewn-in creases down the front and back and a concealed zip at the front of the hems.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Moisturising lip balm in a plastic pot with a lid. 3.7 g.
Trainers in a jacquard weave with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front, and imitation leather heel caps. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping viscose weave with concealed pockets in the side seams and a high waist with wide, covered elastication.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Metal ring.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.

T-shirt and a pair of shorts in soft organic cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket with embroidery. Shorts in soft, patterned chambray with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets, a real back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, textured cotton knit with visible buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the waist. One patterned.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with long raglan sleeves and a knitted checked pattern at the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, a gathered yoke at the back, gathers on the shoulders and short cap sleeves.
